features: IMAGINE A FULL FAT, GOAT MILK TODDLER FORMULA THAT IS MODELED AFTER BREASTFEEDING, AND NATURALLY EASIER TO DIGEST THAN THE OTHER LEADING DAIRY AND COW MILK FORMULAS. May provide relief from cow milk protein sensitivity*. Constipation, Congestion, Colic, Gas, Spit Up, Fussiness, Crying, Sensitive Stomach and Digestive Issues can be signs of cow milk sensitivity! Take back your nights with sound sleep! *not suitable for children with cow milk protein allergy

OVER 20 VITAMINS AND NUTRIENTS FOR HEALTHY GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT. Made with Lactoferrin, 2'FL HMO (Human Milk Oligosaccharide), Prebiotics, Bifidobacteria Probiotics naturally found in breast milk, giving you the highest quality, superior toddler drink formula on the market!

INCLUDES DHA AND ARA AND ABSOLUTELY NO: Maltodextrin, Corn Syrup Solids, Palm Oils, Rice Syrup, Fillers, or Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOs). Why would you choose anything else for the good start your child needs?

GREAT TASTING FOR THOSE PICKY EATERS, ensuring a pleasant and fresh feeding experience for children and parents! Discover why Growth Spurt is becoming every parent's choice for the Best Quality Powdered Formula on the Market! Gentle, Comfort, Worry Free!
INCLUDING A SUPERIOR BIOAVAILABLE METHYLFOLATE instead of Folic Acid, a superb Folate option, as well as Methylated B Vitamins for MTHFR!

MANUFACTURED IN THE USA; manufactured in a State-Of-The-Art Facility for guaranteed purity and quality in every drink! Your Growth Spurt Formula is backed by a lifetime money-back guarantee. Period. No questions asked. Click the Orange Button to order now!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GROWTH SPURT: SUPERIOR GOAT MILK FORMULA TO SUPPORT YOUR GROWING TODDLER! Rather than low quality formulas packed with sugars, corn syrups, and fillers, would you like a premium formula designed to be the closest to breast milk, with only the highest quality ingredients? If so, our Growth Spurt Premium Goat Milk Formula is the ideal choice for you and your toddler! Our Goat Milk Formula is specifically formulated to deliver optimal levels of essential vitamins and minerals that are modeled after breast milk, giving your weaning or supplementing child what he or she needs for strong and thriving development, and to guard against deficiencies throughout childhood. Our Goat Milk Formula is a premium toddler formula with a number of key benefits: Naturally easier to digest Goat Milk based formula that has been shown to have casein protein composition closer to breast milk. (Journal of Dairy Science, Volume 100, Issue 12, December 2017, Pages 10026-10044)Wide spectrum vitamin and mineral formula helps protect against deficiencies for reinforced body and brain development including a superior bioavailable Methylfolate instead of Folic Acid, and Methyl B Vitamins making it a superb option for MTHFR.Can help alleviate allergies and digestive issues due to Cow Milk Sensitivity (*not suitable for children with cow milk protein allergy) (Chad, Z. (2001). Allergies in children. Paediatr Child Health, 6(8), 555-566. doi:10.1093/pch/6.8.555)Includes premium ingredients like Full Cream Goat milk Powder, Lactoferrin, 2'-FL HMO, DHA & ARA, Prebiotics, Bifidobacteria Probiotics and more than 20 important nutrients for growth and development.Has none of the “junk” with absolutely NO: Maltodextrin, Fillers, or Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOs). If you would like a premium toddler formula, specifically formulated to promote optimal growth and guard against deficiencies in your thriving toddler, our Growth Spurt Premium Goat Milk Toddler Formula is the perfect choice!
FDA Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only Heathy Formula
reviews.reviewText: Let me first say that if you can breast feed this is the best for you baby hands down. Some times life happens and you can't. The problem is most formulas are so bad for your baby I don't know how they can sell this as food for any person let alone for a baby. So finding a good formula that won't harm you baby is next to imposable. I have only found 2 and the other one used kelp powder in there formula which could contain heavy metals. In comes Growth Spurt. First they used methylated vitamins in there mix which is amazing because 44% of kids can't process Folic acid which can cause a whole host of problems. The other is B12. Most formulas used Cyanocobalamin. Let me stress this is B12 with Cyanid attached to the Cobalamin molecule. Not good. Growth Spurt does use the best ingredients in there formula hands down. The only ingredient I have a problem with is Sunflower Lecithin. The other amazing thing about this company is their response time to email questions. I saw a discrepancy between the ingredients on amazon and the ones on there website. I sent and email and with in an hour they not only got back to me but updated there website to reflect what is on the back of the can. Amazing! If your looking for a formula this is as close to breastmilk as your going to get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My baby was born a month early and needed some help catching up on her weight gain. We decided we needed to supplement with a formula in addition to breastfeeding. Although the formula is aged for toddlers our health practitioner loved the ingredients of this formula and recommended it above others. My daughter has a bovine protein allergen as well making the goat milk formula perfect for her development. She is getting so big! I'm so happy to see her thrive even if I do miss her tiny features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE the fact the this formula does NOT have GMOs, MALTODEXTRINOR CORN SYRUP!This goat milk has been much gentler on my almost 14 month tot’s stomach. It has prebiotic and probiotics and I am so happy that it actually has real folate instead of man made folic acid. That was a huge relief to see that as I have been searching for something with folate in it. Great ingredients, great product and my baby loves the taste! Very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So pleased to have found this formula, no stomach issues or congestion that comes with most formulas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive tummy
reviews.reviewText: I love this formula. The goat milk is great on my one year olds tummy. She has a sensitive stomach so we decided to stay away from cow milk. This has been a great alternative. My only complaint is that it doesn’t come in bigger sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: Stop buying those weird baby formula with questionable ingredients for your little ones. This is the best. If you taste it,compared to the others u can tell it's real milk. I recommend this to all mommy friends. We have to be a little more conscious of what we're given our children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My experience with the product was amazing. My daughter loves this formula. We are transitioning her off breast milk and I am thankful that Growth Spurt offers a healthy option for babies.I love that all of the ingredients are clean ingredients and that growth spurt uses full cream goats milk.I was also impressed growth spurt uses healthy oils like coconut oil. Most formulas are full of unhealthy oils.I’m also thankful there is no sugar or high fructose corn syrup in this formula. That was a requirement that was very important to me.We love growth spurt formula and will continue to use the toddler formula until 24 months.Thank you for providing healthy options for my baby girl

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s the best we’ve tried!
reviews.reviewText: By far the better of the two options pictured.Pros:Baby loves the taste!No weird smells (not goat-y or fishy!)Less expensive than comparable brandsCreamy & blends easilyCons:None
